definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: appoint (NH id., appoint, assign, esp. of acquiring or designating as wife; Aram. id.; Ar. wa9ada promise, threaten, predict, III. appoint a time or place; perh. As. ādu, decide, M-A:17 Dl:HWB 230; Ph. n. pr. [[אשמניעד]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. sf. [[יְעָדוֹ]] 2Sa 20:5; [[יְעָדָהּ]] Ex 21:8 + 2 t.; Impf. 3 m. sf. [[יִיעָדֶנׇּה]] Ex 21:9; —appoint, a time 2Sa 20:5; place Je 47:7; a rod Mic 6:9; assign or designate as concubine Ex 21:8, Ex 21:9 (JE).
reflexive, meet at an appointed place, with [[לְ]], of Yahweh meeting Moses at the Tent of ‘Meeting’ Ex 29:42, Ex 29:43, Ex 30:36 (P); at the throne of the Kapporeth Ex 25:22, Ex 30:6, Nu 17:19 (P).
meet by appointment Am 3:3, Job 2:11; with [[בְּ]] of place, Ne 6:2; [[אֶל]] of place v:Ne 6:10.

gather, assemble by appointment, kings for a campaign (abs.) Jos 11:5 (D), Ps 48:5; with [[אֶל]], unto Moses Nu 10:4 (P); to the door of the tent of meeting v:Nu 10:3 (P); with [[עַל]], unto Solomon 1Ki 8:5 = 2Ch 5:6; against Yahweh Nu 14:35, Nu 16:11, Nu 27:3 (P).

definitions.title: Po‘ēl
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[יוֹעַדְתִּי]] (for MT [[יוֹדַעְתִּי]]) 1Sa 21:3 sq. acc. pers. + [[אֶל]] of place, acc. to LXX We Dr Kit Bu.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[מִי]] [[יוֹעִדֶנִּי]] Je 50:44 = [[מִי יׁעִידֶנִּי]] Je 49:19 = [[מִי יוֹעִידֵנִי]] Job 9:19 who will make me meet him at the appointed place (of judgement)? i.e. who will summon or arraign me?

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מוּעָדִים לִפְנֵי]] Je 24:1 be set, placed before; [[אָנׇה פָנַיִח מֻעָדוֹת]] Ez Eze 21:21 whither thy face is set.
